ability.from sentence: In this paper , we improve the model of by providing the ability to answer more complicated questions .

richer representation.from sentence: s The main contributions of the paper are : ( 1 ) a more sophisticated inference procedure that is both efficient and can consider longer paths ( considered only answers directly connected to the question in the graph ) ; and ( 2 ) a richer representation of the answers which encodes the question - answer path and surrounding subgraph of the KB .
